title: Elijah's Need (9)
description: Fans of J. Kenner and Vi Keeland would love Elijah’s Want , book eight in the Shark’s Edge series, a romantic suspense series full of intrigue, billionaires, and a touch of BDSM.Is their love stronger than their secrets?Finally coming clean with his best friends and girlfriend, Elijah Banks should feel a huge burden lifted from his conscience. But his persistent ex keeps turning up to threaten his future plans for happiness.Hannah Farsey is determined to be the captain o f her life’s ship. No more putting others’ needs in front of her own , and no more making decisions out of anxiety and fear . Now that Hannah knows Elijah’s darkest secret, should she follow her head and run for the hills , or follow her heart and stand by he r man?After a rushed marriage proposal coupled with an impromptu trip to Las Vegas with all their friends, she goes into panic mode.Are they really ready to make a lifelong commitment , or is he acting out of fear of losing her? How far is the gorgeous, successful businessman willing to go to lock down his beautiful, feisty chef?
author: Victoria Blue
